WRITING.TEXT: I get along with both of my parents famously. My mother's other husbands and boyfriends even get along with me alright. I'm both ny mother and fathers best friend. When I came out my dad took it in stride. He was surprised but he was good with it. My mother was in denial and then tried to set me back up with every ex girlfriend she knew about. It didn't go great lol But my father and I are thick as thieves

I have five gay friends. 1: dilpickle, old roommate and dnd player. Get along great, one of my best friends. We both thing the other is the ugliest piece of shit to walk the earth. 2: yogi bear, another old fried and I used to live with his brother (my best friend). He had a crush on me for a bit and we stopped talking. When he got over the crush we started hanging out again and we get along great again. 3: math boy, went on a few dates but he didn't want anything serious so I started seeing my now ex. Math boy wanted to keep the friendship going so we kept hanging out and I just see him as a friend now. He kinda proclaimed his love to me though the last time we hung out. 4: little joey, really cute guy who I slept with for a bit. We get along really well and have almost dated a couple times but I'm the kinda guy that goes and gets what he wants and he likes the guys who he has to chase to get into a relationship. 5: art guy, we almost dated. We both think the other is attractive, we have a lot in common and used to talk about art all the time. He lives far away so we didn't date. He got a new boyfriend and doesn't talk to me much at all, think he's keeping me as a back up of things don't work out with his guy lol
I'm still pretty friendly with a bunch of my exes and old hook ups, plus there are the other gay guys that I hang out with from time to time or get a beer with. People tend to get along with me.

It was pointed out to me that I'm one of these guys, i spent some time think about why I did it. I never really realized I did. The reason was because I felt insecure that the guy I was dating was hotter than me so I though 'hey look at all these pretty people who fuck me' Point out the problem to him and he'll try and fix it. It's a little tough getting used to not talking about it though so give him some slack for a bit.
I go up to them and say "do you want to be friends in a not me plowing your ass way" it usually gets them to laugh and then I say "see you already think I'm funny"

I'm pretty dom and make them look me in the eye and say "I concede". Only "I concede" works, not "I give up" "I surrender"... it gives the sub a chance to fight back by saying "I give" and then I get to break them of that. It's a ton of fun :)

WRITING.TITLE: How do you stay happy single?
WRITING.TEXT:
Since I came out as bi I've constantly been dating people or I'm in relationships. I know what I need right now is to focus on improving myself but late nights like tonight make me lonely and miss having a cuddle buddy. How can I be happy single again?
Edit: thank you all so much :) I deleted Grindr, joined a gym today, put in new job applications, took my mother to lunch, got dinner with a friend, cut a toxic "friend" out of my life and made plans with people I haven't seen in awhile.
I love all of your advice, you are great guys :)))

I'm the same way to be honest, only I'm the more rugged one lol Don't lower your standards if it will also lower your happiness. I'm single right now and am taking my time to choose the right guy who checks the boxes for me.
Get new peers. When people ask about college talk about your academic accomplishments. Find people who genuinely respect you and value you. Quite worrying about a past you can't change

I'm an outgoing confident guy. I have a friend with social anxiety that has me go out with him and help him get guys. His first dates are always double dates or I've pretended to be his roommate before to excuse my presence there. If you have a friend like me then ask him/her to help you out. After a few times it will get easier for you and now my anxious friend is one of my closest friends and I like his boyfriend.

I'm bi and want a son. My ex (guy) wanted me to go father a son so we could raise him together and he'd look like us, my ex looked a lot like me. Ps I mostly just posted on here because I'm drunk and miss my ex but I'm not gonna be that guy that desperately drunk texts an ex. Instead I'll be the guy who posts about him on Reddit.
Thank you :)))

In a couple years you're going to regret ending the friendship over this. In a couple years you're going to regret waisted so much time obsessing over a guy you never had a chance of a future with.
Love yourself then your friend, do what you'll regret the least.

I hate to say it but I don't think he is going to change. It just sounds like that is who he is. You need to detach your success from his. You two need different rides into and from work if you want the relationship to survive. Also it kinda sounds like you both work at a Walmart like job. If that's the case then don't be too concerned about the job. It's easy to find other jobs like this one and you need to decide if being a good worker there is worth tanking your relationship happiness. Also if it is this kind of job he might just be lethargic because of the shit quality of the work. If he isn't this way when you do other things then don't paint him by his approach to his job. I suggest that you two get jobs at different places and ride separately into work. Good luck out there.

Fearing it's going to end at any moment is a sure fire way to make it end. Make the long term plans but also play it by ear. Don't buy cruise tickets for six months from now but plan to go and put the vacation time in. After you've bend together longer this will all become more natural for you.
